# tidyenigh

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `tidyenigh` is to provide the user with analysis-ready data from  [ENIGH](https://www.inegi.org.mx/programas/enigh/nc/2022/).

Currently under development.
